snippet.title: Apple II Game: Championship Lode Runner (1984 Brøderbund Software) [Longplay]
snippet.description:
An action-platform puzzle-solving strategy game sequel to the original Lode Runner game in 1983. Unlike the original Lode Runner, this game only has 50 levels and are very difficult and much more challenging and the game ends when you complete all 50 levels. This game was designed for more advanced expert pro gamers. There's no level editor as you must play through the levels in order. But there's a save game option provided but you lose a life everytime a game is restored. 

Played on MESS emulator and recorded using its AVI output.

Note: This is even more difficult than the original Lode Runner game. I had to use walk-through guides and lookup walk-through videos on how to get through each level. But thank god I made it and  I will not have to play this game again. Have fun and enjoy.
